text:
When Nandi informed Shiva about Sati's death, he became very furious.
 He angrily pulled out a locks of hair and dashed it against the mountain, which got divided into two parts.
 From one part manifested the valiant Veerbharda and from the other part Mahakali.
 Veerbhadra and Mahakali were instructed by Shiva to destroy the yagya of Daksha and to kill all the people who were present during the time of Sati's death, including the deities and the sages.
title: Manifestation of Veerbharda & Mahakali
